csvUpload.title: Bulk Upload
csvUpload.description: Upload multiple {entityType} records at once using CSV format

bulkUpload.title: Bulk Upload Tool
bulkUpload.subtitle: Easily import multiple records into the Maritime Directory

steps.download: Download the template for your data type
steps.fill: Fill in your data following the format in the template
steps.validate: Check your data for errors before uploading
steps.save: Save your file in CSV format
steps.upload: Click the upload button to begin
steps.confirm: Wait for confirmation of successful upload

reqDetails.format: CSV format with headers in the first row
reqDetails.headers: Headers must match the template exactly
